rev.desc.rev.desc: update start panel, support retract scenario
No value for $L.file.save in us.notify causes a notification error when you try to approve an interaction
add if (not (null ($L.parent.file))) then ($L.void = fduplicate( $L.parent.file.save, $L.parent.file)) in panel decide.approval.status
* added a 'Parent Locked?' parameter, which is used to indicate whether the parent record is already locked coming into this subroutine call; if so, this application's lock/unlock calls are bypassed
* modified the 'start' panel to default '$L.locked' to false if a value for the 'Parent Locked?' parameter is not passed in
* changed the exit for 'decide.approval.status' from 'lock.parent.file' to 'check.locked'
* created a 'check.locked' panel which exits to 'check.record.action' if '$L.locked' is true, 'lock.parent.file' otherwise
* changed the exit for 'check.approval.status.change' from 'unlock.parent.file' to 'decide.unlock'
* changed the exit for 'save.parent.file' from 'unlock.parent.file' to 'decide.unlock'
* created a 'decide.unlock' panel which exists to 'exit.normal' if '$L.locked' is true, 'unlock.parent.file' otherwise

descript.descript: update start panel, support retract scenario
No value for $L.file.save in us.notify causes a notification error when you try to approve an interaction
add if (not (null ($L.parent.file))) then ($L.void = fduplicate( $L.parent.file.save, $L.parent.file)) in panel decide.approval.status
* added a 'Parent Locked?' parameter, which is used to indicate whether the parent record is already locked coming into this subroutine call; if so, this application's lock/unlock calls are bypassed
* modified the 'start' panel to default '$L.locked' to false if a value for the 'Parent Locked?' parameter is not passed in
* changed the exit for 'decide.approval.status' from 'lock.parent.file' to 'check.locked'
* created a 'check.locked' panel which exits to 'check.record.action' if '$L.locked' is true, 'lock.parent.file' otherwise
* changed the exit for 'check.approval.status.change' from 'unlock.parent.file' to 'decide.unlock'
* changed the exit for 'save.parent.file' from 'unlock.parent.file' to 'decide.unlock'
* created a 'decide.unlock' panel which exists to 'exit.normal' if '$L.locked' is true, 'unlock.parent.file' otherwise
